bibl.title: Bilistiche and the Quasi-Institutional Status of Ptolemaic Royal Mistress.
bibl.note: S'appuie en part. sur le témoignage de POSIDIPPE, Épigr. 36; 88; 78; 82; 87 A.-B.; Anth. Pal. V, 202-203. - P. 34: Observations on the date for Arsinoe II's death.
bibl.seg: KOSMETATOU Elizabeth, Bilistiche and the Quasi-Institutional Status of Ptolemaic Royal Mistress.
S'appuie en part. sur le témoignage de POSIDIPPE, Épigr. 36; 88; 78; 82; 87 A.-B.; Anth. Pal. V, 202-203. - P. 34: Observations on the date for Arsinoe II's death.
